## valenceVec frequency with empty days and all variables
```{r read file}

file <- read.csv("/Users/lucia/phd_work/cognitive_distortion/newScripts/moodVector/moodVectorsData/ValenceEmptyFreqAllVar.csv")
file['userid'] <- NULL
file['X'] <- NULL
ValenceEmptyFreqcorMa <- rcorr(as.matrix(file))
ValenceEmptyFreqcorMa

```
